resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106680</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106680</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204556</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Lactase enzyme lab</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Laktaseenzymlabor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Laboratoire d'enzymes de lactase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Laboratório do enzyme do lactase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Laboratorio degli enzimi della lattasi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Lactase ενζυμικό εργαστήριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Laboratorio de la enzima de la lactasa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lab will examine the specificity of an enzyme (lactase) to a specific substrate (lactose). Students will observe the actions of the enzyme and how shape is important to enzyme reactions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Labor überprüft die Besonderheit eines 
Enzyms (Laktase) zu einem spezifischen Substrat (Laktose). 
Kursteilnehmer beobachten die Tätigkeiten des Enzyms und wie 
Form zu den Enzymreaktionen wichtig ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce laboratoire examinera la spécificité d'une 
enzyme (lactase) à un substrat spécifique (lactose). Les 
étudiants observeront les actions de l'enzyme et comment la forme est
importante pour les réactions enzymiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este laboratório examinará o specificity de um 
enzyme (lactase) a uma carcaça específica (lactose). Os 
estudantes observarão as ações do enzyme e como a forma é 
importante para reações de enzyme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo laboratorio esaminerà la specificità di 
un enzima (lattasi) ad un substrato specifico (lattosio). Gli 
allievi osserveranno le azioni dell'enzima e come la figura è 
importante alle reazioni enzimiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το εργαστήριο θα εξετάσει την ιδιομορφία ενός 
ενζύμου (lactase) σε ένα συγκεκριμένο υπόστρωμα (λακτόζη). 
Οι σπουδαστές θα παρατηρήσουν τις ενέργειες του ενζύμου και 
πώς η μορφή είναι σημαντική στις ενζυμικές αντιδράσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este laboratorio examinará la especificidad de 
una enzima (lactasa) a un substrato específico (lactosa). Los 
estudiantes observarán las acciones de la enzima y cómo la 
dimensión de una variable es importante para las reacciones 
enzimáticas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:BERT WARTSKI
FN:BERT WARTSKI
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204556</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106680</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/lactase-enzyme-lab</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
